sentences.en: A distinction must be made between archaeology proper and science-based archaeology.
sentences.cn: 必须区分考古学本身和以科学为基础的考古学。

sentences.en: Britain imposed fines on airlines which bring in passengers without proper papers.
sentences.cn: 英国会对运载证件不齐全的乘客进入国内的航空公司课以罚款。

sentences.en: Carol managed a few proper snivels for the sake of appearance.
sentences.cn: 为了做做样子，卡萝尔适时地抽了几下鼻子。

sentences.en: Catherine demonstrated the proper way to cleanse the face.
sentences.cn: 凯瑟琳演示了洁面的正确方法。

sentences.en: Everything was in its proper place (= where it should be ) .
sentences.cn: 每样东西都放在恰当的位置。

sentences.en: He denied that he'd failed to keep a proper lookout that night.
sentences.cn: 他否认当晚守望不力。

sentences.en: He is always perfectly proper in his behaviour.
sentences.cn: 他的行为举止向来是无可挑剔的。

sentences.en: I always cook a proper evening meal.
sentences.cn: 我总是把晚餐做得很丰盛。

sentences.en: In twenty years of mar-riage he has only taken two proper vacations.
sentences.cn: 结婚二十年里，他只像样地度过两次假。

sentences.en: It is only right and proper that an independent inquiry should take place.
sentences.cn: 唯一正确的做法是进行独立调查。

sentences.en: It is right and proper that parents take responsibility for their children's attendance at school.
sentences.cn: 父母负责督促子女上学上课，这是天经地义的事。

sentences.en: It is right and proper to do this.
sentences.cn: 这么做很得体。

sentences.en: It's a proper Christmas dinner, with turkey and bread sauce.
sentences.cn: 这是顿像样的圣诞大餐，有火鸡和牛奶沙司。

sentences.en: The offender made proper restitution to the victim's kindred.
sentences.cn: 违法者对受害人亲属给予了适当的补偿。

sentences.en: The proper name for Matthew’s condition is hyperkinetic syndrome.
sentences.cn: 马修的病的恰当名称是多动症。

sentences.en: the proper way to clean your teeth
sentences.cn: 正确的刷牙方法

sentences.en: We often neglect to make proper use of our bodies.
sentences.cn: 我们经常忘记该合理地使用我们的身体。

sentences.en: We should have had a proper discussion before voting.
sentences.cn: 我们本应在表决之前好好讨论一下才是。

sentences.en: We tend to imagine that the Victorians were very prim and proper.
sentences.cn: 我们倾向于把维多利亚时代的人想象得非常古板、中规中矩。

sentences.en: You can't tell her that joke—she's much too prim and proper .
sentences.cn: 你可别跟她讲那个笑话，她这个人古板正经得要命。

sentences.en: You must have felt a proper charlie!
sentences.cn: 你一定觉得自己是个十足的笨蛋！

phrases.tran_cn: 本征函数；本寨数，特寨数
适当的时候；[物理]原时；本征时间

trans.tran_cn: 适宜的，正确的，像样的，规矩的，严格意义上的，完全的，特有的
